name: com.yohash.propulsion
description: A collection of scripts to enable physics-based propulsion

samples.description: A sample controller that compares PID controller, a backwards PD controller, and a stable PD controller along 1 axis to physically match a target's position
A sample controller that compares a 3-axis PID controller, a backwards PD controller, and a stable PD controller to physically match a target's position
A sample controller that compares a PID controller and a Stable PD controller to physically rotate a turret to point at a target
A sample controller that uses a stable backward PD controller to physically rotate a turret to point at a target while maintaining an "Up" rotation
This sample controller applies inputs to the vehicle motor to drive a car
This example uses the Vehicle PD controller as an AI which matches a user-controlled vehicle
